bike.description: FACT IS 9m carbon front triangle, 29" geometry, M5 alloy rear triangle, tapered HT, carbon PF30 BB, ISCG ’05, internal Command Post routing, 142mm dropouts, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 130mm travel
